Headline: Temporary Northbound #X49 Western Express Reroute near Western/Pershing
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western Ave, 47th, Western Blvd, Archer and Western Ave: near Western/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western Ave, 47th, Western Blvd, Archer, Western Ave and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Western/Pershing.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
